decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings:	00 - 0100 - 01 (Site Location and Existing Block Plan); 00 - 0101 - 01 (Proposed Block Plan); 01 - 0201 - 01 (Existing Elevations); 01 - 0100 - 01 (Existing Ground Floor Plan); 01 - 0101 - 01 (Existing First Floor Plan); 01 - 0102 - 01 (Existing Second Floor Plan); 01 - 0103 - 01 (Existing Roof Plan); 05 - 0100 - 01 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); 05 - 0101 - 01 (Proposed First Floor Plan); 05 - 0102 - 01 (Proposed Second Floor Plan); 05 - 0103 - 01 (Proposed Roof Plan); 05 - 0201 - 01 (Proposed Elevations); 05 - 0400 - 01 (Proposed Typical Section); 26 - 0101 - 01 (Ground Floor Fire Strategy); 26 - 0101 - 01 (First Floor Fire Strategy); 26 - 0102 - 01 (Second Floor Fire Strategy).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | The extensions hereby approved to Nos. 26 and 28 Lexden Road shall be constructed and completed simultaneously in accordance with the drawings listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not result in detrimental residential amenity impacts in accordance with the National Planning Framework (2023), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan 2021, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core) Strategy (2012); policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013); and policy DAA of Ealing's draft Local Plan (Reg 19).
description: Single storey rear extensions at both 26 Lexden Road and 28 Lexden Road (Joint application).
